feed.title: SAP Community - Big Data
feed.subtitle: Big Data Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: How to extract program usage rate from SAP data table?
entry.content:
Hi all SAP experts,

I'd like to calculate usage rate of add-on programs to eliminate useless add-ons. Is that able to extract from SAP data table? Or do we need to set up logging functionarity?

entry.title: I need data for SAP customers
entry.content:
Hello

for a graduation project ,i would like to know all the companies that use SAP in certain countries in EUROPE .

Thanks to you all .

entry.title: Which table contains audit logs?
entry.content:
I'm looking for the data to calculate program usage how many times our add on program used and who used it, that I assume it might included in audit logs.

Does anybody know which sap table might contain such a informations?

entry.title: Tying PNs and SNs back to POs.
entry.content:
Hello talented people. I'm trying to tie documents from another system back to the PO. The documents have PNs and SNs. I'm hoping there is a table, or at least a combination of tables, that can get me the SNs tied back to a specific PO. My SAP backend knowledge is very limited.

Thanks!

entry.title: SAP OPERA/ SE16 Data extraction for logistics
entry.content:
Hello,

I am trying to extract a compilation of data from SAP, but I am unable to do so. Could this be done via SE16 or does anyone have another solution?

The data:

- Date

- Trip number

- Region

- Departure time

- Arrival time

- Start kilometres

- End mileage

- Product list

entry.title: Focus Buils test cases
entry.content: if i have to change the status of the multiple test cases from one test package to " Ok" from " untested" at one go or few clicks. How can I do it. Can someone help me if their is any data loader kind of thing in Focus build or mass change which can help me save more time or some fire fighter kind of access would be required.

entry.title: Connect SAP ByD with Data Factory using SAP HANA
entry.content:
Hello Everyone,

I understand that SAP Business ByDesign uses SAP HANA as its primary database. Azure Data Factory also provides a connector for interfacing with SAP HANA. Therefore, I am wondering, could I use this connector to access SAP Business ByDesign data through SAP HANA?

entry.title: How to add an Assembly to a Datapackage
entry.content:
Hey, I'm just curious if it is possible to add an Assembly Document to a Datapackage Technic? The Drawing of the Masterdocument was the only on that appears here. The Assembly exist and is connected to the Material Number but doesn't show up. Do someone know how it works to add an document manually?

Thanks

entry.title: How to copy data from a version to another multiple times in SAC
entry.content:
Hi all,

I have a data action created to copy data from a selected version to another fixed it. It works properly, but, I want to add to this data action other steps. I want also to copy the data from a version (v1) to the version v1-1. And the same with the version 2 and with the version 3 (to the v3-3)...until version 5.

How can I do this? Because I am not sure to do it well,

entry.title: Imput Controls in SAC
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

In the optimized view of stories in SAC, is possible to have imput controls and filter the dimension shown in the graphs by selecting the dimension in this imput control?

Thanks

entry.title: Use a chart with volume of two Versions in SAC
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

In a chart I want to show the difference in the volume of one version compared to another in the same bars, but when it comes to displaying the chart bars they appear in different bars and not in the same one (to know that variation between versions).

Thanks

entry.title: SAP data verification - migration/load manual
entry.content:
Dear All. I am currently working on a SAP system validation project where we are implementing a new SAP system in the company. There are thousands of data points from multiple old systems which have to be transferred onto SAP. I am just wondering what kind of verification/validation do we need before and after data migration/load? Also it will be very helpful if anyone can share a generic template of selecting number of samples, risk assessment and evidence of testing for guidance purpose only.

Please let me know if I haven't tagged the right users as new to this platform.

Regards

Pankaj

entry.title: Create Version in the Model in SAC
entry.content:
Hello all,

Which type of users can create a new Version in the model after pressing a Data Action? Only the administrator?

Because I have a doubt that a user who is not the administrator and does not have permission to edit the model can create versions through a button that copies the data to a new version.

In the event that you cannot and it is best that these users never have these permissions, the person in charge of giving that button and, therefore, only the administrator will have to create the version. Is it so?

Thank you

entry.title: Change style of lock cells in SAC
entry.content:
Hello all,

I want to have the lock cells with different background, to differentiate from the editable cells.

It is possible to change this style?

Or is it only possible to change the ones for the editable cells in the styling of each table?

Thanks

entry.title: Keep cells locked in SAC
entry.content:
Hello all,

Is there a way when you lock a cell, then exit the story, and when you re-enter, that cell remains locked as before.

Thanks

entry.title: Programming a Data Action in SAC
entry.content:
Hello all,

I want to create a data action that copies the data from one version to another but each month the target version is different. so I would like to know if it can be automated. And without selecting the target version every single month.

Is it possible to do this ?

Thanks

entry.title: Edit a Subtitle of a table in SAC
entry.content:
Hello all,

I'm trying to add a subtitle to a table but there's no way. I have tried showing only the subtitle and hiding the title but it won't let me write anything.

Thanks

entry.title: Formula isnull in Account dimension in SAC
entry.content:
Hello all,

I want an account value to be either 1 or 0 depending on whether any of the account values have data. That is, if there is one without data, it will give me a 1 and if all of them have it, a 1 will appear.

What formula can I use?

Thank you

entry.title: Mass upload Leave of Abscense
entry.content:
Hi,

Is there any development work going on enabling Super Users to Mass upload Leave of abscense on employees in People Data?

/Ludwig

entry.title: How to stop an incorrect upload in SAP Fieldglass?
entry.content: If there is a incorrect/wrong data that has been uploaded in Fieldglass and if it is in process, How can we stop that upload in SAP Fieldglass when it is in process? Is there an option were we can stop the data upload in Fieldglass or what is the procedure to stop it?
